scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile && npm run abi:extract -- --no-compile
scripts.compile: node --stack-size=4096 node_modules/.bin/truffle compile --all && npm run compile:copy-from-pool && npm run compile:copy-from-convenience
scripts.compile:copy-from-convenience: cd ../convenience && npm run build && cp ./artifacts/contracts/Convenience.sol/Convenience.json ../dao/build/contracts/Convenience.json && cd ../dao
scripts.compile:copy-from-pool: cd ../pool && npm run build && cp ./artifacts/contracts/Api3Pool.sol/Api3Pool.json ../dao/build/contracts/Api3Pool.json && cp ./artifacts/contracts/auxiliary/Api3Token.sol/Api3Token.json ../dao/build/contracts/Api3Token.json && cp ./artifacts/contracts/auxiliary/TimelockManager.sol/TimelockManager.json ../dao/build/contracts/TimelockManager.json && cd ../dao
scripts.test: npm run prepublishOnly  && npm run test:ganache
scripts.deploy:rpc: npm run compile && rm -f arapp_local.json && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network rpc
scripts.deploy:devnet: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network devnet
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network rinkeby --ens 0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D --dao-factory 0xad4d106b43b480faa3ef7f98464ffc27fc1faa96 --mini-me-factory 0x6ffeb4038f7f077c4d20eaf1706980caec31e2bf
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network ropsten --ens 0x6afe2cacee211ea9179992f89dc61ff25c61e923 --dao-factory 0x233c587095d066bafe44b543a719c93ff16423f3 --mini-me-factory 0x1ce5621d386b2801f5600f1dbe29522805b8ac11
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet --ens 0x00000000000C2E074eC69A0dFb2997BA6C7d2e1e --dao-factory 0xb9da44c051c6cc9e04b7e0f95e95d69c6a6d8031 --mini-me-factory 0x909d05f384d0663ed4be59863815ab43b4f347ec
